summary: The King of France Gros Pif thinks only of stuffing himself, slumming and having fun and during this time overwhelms the tax people.
cast: Coluche|Gérard Lanvin|Anémone|Dominique Lavanant|Gérard Jugnot|Martin Lamotte|Michel Blanc|Philippe Bruneau|Roland Giraud|Michel Puterflam|Philippe Manesse|Christian Spillemaecker|Jean Jacques|Jacques Canselier|Marie-Anne Chazel|François Dyrek|Thierry Lhermitte|Jean-Louis Tristan|Roger Riffard|Luis Rego|Fernand Guiot|Véronique K. Colucci|Roberto|Christian Clavier|Georges Adet|Georges Ass|Lucien Charbonnier|Louis Dubois|Robert Le Béal|Ernest Menzer|Bruno Moynot|Auguste Geronimi|Patrick Olivier|Claude Barichasse|Yvon Brexel|Olivier Constantin|Charles Dalin|Jacques Delaporte|Sotha
title: Vous n'aurez pas l'Alsace et la Lorraine
